id.description: The unique identifier of the sequence step.

bounceCount.description: The count of bounced emails in the sequence step.

clickCount.description: The count of clicks on links in the emails of the sequence step.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the sequence step was created.

date.description: The date associated with the sequence step.

deliverCount.description: The count of successfully delivered emails in the sequence step.

displayName.description: The display name of the sequence step.

failureCount.description: The count of failed tasks or steps in the sequence.

interval.description: The time interval or gap between different steps in the sequence.

negativeReplyCount.description: The count of negative replies received in response to the sequence.

neutralReplyCount.description: The count of neutral replies received in response to the sequence.

openCount.description: The count of opened emails in the sequence step.

optOutCount.description: The count of recipients who opted out of further communication in the sequence step.

order.description: The order or sequence index of the step in the overall sequence.

positiveReplyCount.description: The count of positive replies received in response to the sequence.

replyCount.description: The total count of replies received in response to the sequence.

scheduleCount.description: The count of scheduled tasks or steps in the sequence.

stepType.description: The type or category of the sequence step.

taskAutoDisplay.description: Flag indicating if tasks in the step are automatically displayed.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the sequence step was last updated.

callPurpose.description: The purpose of the call associated with the sequence step.

calls.description: The calls made in the sequence step.

creator.description: The creator or person responsible for the sequence step.

mailings.description: The mailings associated with the sequence step.

sequence.description: The sequence associated with the step.

sequenceTemplates.description: The templates associated with the sequence step.

taskPriority.description: The priority level of tasks associated with the sequence step.

tasks.description: The tasks associated with the sequence step.

updater.description: The user who last updated the sequence step.
